title: IPv4 Type
content: You can use the type attribute to configure the IPv4 type. The default value is IPv4.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: IPv6 Type
content: The value can be set to IPv6 through type. The default value is IPv4.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: Read-only text
content: Use the readonly attribute to set the read-only line of the text. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: Disabled
content: The disabled attribute is used to set whether to disable text. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: Text box size
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: Property Setting Separator
content: You can set the separator (icon class) through the delimiter attribute.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: Default slot
content: The separator can be set through the default slot.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: focus event
content: The focus event is triggered when the text box obtains the focus.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: blur event
content: The blur event is triggered when the text box loses focus.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: change event
content: The change event is triggered when the text box content changes.

title: select event
content: The select event is triggered when the text box content is selected.
findIntroStr: The IP address text box is the same as that of the native IpAddress component of the HTML. In addition, the data binding function is provided.

title: input event
content: The input event is triggered when a user enters a text box.
